snippet: A well-heeled coalition is pushing to enact a public financing system for elections, starting next week with mailings to the constituents of four state senators.
abstract: New York Leadership for Accountable Government is pushing to enact a public financing system for elections in New York State, whose campaign finance system is among the least restrictive in the nation; well-heeled coalition, which says New York is a symbol of institutionalized corruption, is backed by investment backers and philanthropists.
lead_paragraph: A well-heeled coalition is pushing to enact a public financing system for elections, starting next week with mailings to the constituents of four state senators.

headline.seo: Coalition Urges Public Financing in New York State Elections
headline.main: Wealthy Group Seeks to Reform Election Giving in New York
headline.print_headline: Wealthy Group Seeks to Reform Election Giving

keywords.value: New York Leadership for Accountable Government
keywords.name: organizations
